1.content:
IN THE FOREST OF DEAN.

Harry gazed at the spot between the trees. Whoever had put the sword in the pool must’ve used it as the lookout point. If only he could see who had been there seconds, minutes ago ... !
“Harry!” said Ron, suddenly. “Harry! The omnioculars! Remember what the saleswizard said, on the campsite? Remember how we proved Winky’s innocence, that night in the forest when Cedric’s Dad was accusing her of casting the dark mark?”
Harry gaped. He put his hand in to the pouch around his neck and pulled out the omnioculars.
He focussed them on the spot, and pressed the ‘show me what happened there’ button.
The screen went blank, and then, with a sudden swoop, presented Harry with a picture. It was hazy at first, and then became clearer.
Harry stared.
He was staring in to a face he hated. A face with greasy, black hair.
“Harry!” Ron’s impatient voice brought him back. “Don’t just stand there with your mouth open! Here!”
Ron snatched the omnioculars from Harry. He looked through them and lowered them from his eyes very, very slowly.
He and Harry gazed at each other, the omniculars hanging limply in Ron’s hand.
“Snape?” the mouthed, together. “Snape?”
1.title: It was Severus Snape!

121.content:
Hermione took the omnioculars and put them to her eyes. The other two heard her muttering something under her breath. "Wow, she knows how to make these more powerful," Ron whispered to Harry.

Suddenly, Hermione froze. The omnioculars fell from her hands.

The other two stepped closer to her, alarmed. "What happened?" Harry asked, as Ron tried to shake Hermione in to action.

"You're right, it was Snape. And I went back in to where he had been before this -- Harry, he was with Dumbledore's portrait in the Headmaster's study, and Dumbledore told him to give us the sword!"

12112.content:
"Well!" breathed Ron. "That gives us one answer, at any rate. We have to use the sword on the Horcruxes."

"But we still don't know where they are!" replied Hermione, desperately. "Dumbledore's told us all he knew, now it's up to us, isn't it?"

"We're going to do this," Harry said, determinedly. "We're going to find out where Voldemort has hidden all the Horcruxes."

The three of them sat and planned.

And at the center of their plans, was the pair of omnioculars.

info.brief_description: Harry finds out Snape is helping him in the forest of Dean
info.description:
This interactive has been created at the request of a newbie.
Have fun adding to it!

In Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows, Harry and Ron have just retrieved the sword from the frozen pool in the Forest of Dean.

Now, they want to see who put it there.

In my imagination, they use the omnioculars they had bought at the Quidditch World Cup, and find out that Snape is the one helping them.
